name: Tsukumogami Demon's Fire
effect: 30-50% All Special Attacks unblockable chance. 30-50% Opponent unblockable attack chance reduction. 150-600% Damage boost. White Lotus Tower only. [ERRON BLACK] Whenever Erron Black does not have enought Power to perform a Special Attack, a sinister demon who lives in his rifle can feast on his blood and help him use Health instead of Power to perform this Special Attack (this Special Attack will not be able to trigger Regeneration). 1 bar = 30% of Max Health, 2 bars = 50% of Max health, 3 bars = 70% of Max Health. [ERRON BLACK] {{Friendship}}
max_fusion_effect: After a successful Special Attack 2, a daemon hexes the opponent with a Spirit Flame. Spirit Flame drains Health and Power from the opponent. The more opponents are affected by Spirit Flame, the more Health and Power is drained. The hex can only be removed by killing the demon, Dispel or the final death of the hexed opponent.
